did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: NLRB Briefs, Petitions and other Legal Documents, 1935-1958
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The collection consists of a sample of the briefs, petitions, and other legal documents issued by the National Labor Relations Board in cases which were appealed in the Supreme Court and the various district courts for the period 1937-1951.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United States. National Labor Relations Board

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: NLRB Briefs, Petitions and other Legal Documents #5318. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
